NA₄.KIŠIB {m}PAP-bu-u LU₂.DAM.QAR-ANŠE.KUR de-e-ni ša {m}PAP-bu-u TA {m}{d}PA-PAP-AŠ ig-ru-u-ni ma-a šum₂-ma la-a ina ŠA₃-bi GIŠ.GIGIR tah-lip₂ a-ni šum₂-ma la-a {m}{d}PA-PAP-AŠ x MA.NA.MEŠ KU₃.BABBAR ku-zip-pi a-na {m}PAP-bu-u it-ti-din u₂-sa-lam 1 GIN₂ 1/2 GIN₂ la re-hi DI-mu ina ber-ti-šu₂-nu la in-ṭi {m}PAP-bu-u TA ŠA₃ {m}{d}PA-PAP-AŠ it-ta-sa-ah man-nu
